{3}{R}, {T}, Raze: Other creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To raze, sacrifice a land or exile a land card from your graveyard.)[/i]
{1}{G}, {T}, Raze: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [i](To raze, sacrifice a land or exile a land card from your graveyard.)[/i]
